David has also made a neat browser-based tool for converting any video into a pure CSS keyframe animation ready to be dropped into yourÂ site.

It's trusted by hundreds of high-growth startups such as Perplexity, Vercel, Drata, andÂ Webflow.

Scott Jehl

Create Interactive Tutorials in the Browser â€” TutorialKit enables you to create interactive tutorials instantly without building or managing any backendÂ infrastructure.

font-size Limbo â€” Some nuanced thoughts on what font-size we should be reaching for as a default in 2024. Geoff Graham at CSS-Tricks chimed inÂ too.

typlr.app: Create Fonts in the Browser â€” If youâ€™ve never attempted to make your own font, this might be a cool place to start! This interactive tool allows you to customize each letterâ€™s shape and kerning, and you can install it as aÂ PWA.

Evgeny Agasyants

ObsoHTML: Node and CLI Tool to Find Obsolete HTML â€” ObsoHTML is a Node.js script designed to scan HTML, PHP, JavaScript, and TypeScript files within a specified directory for obsolete or proprietary HTML attributes and elements. Should help keep thingsÂ tidy.

Jens Oliver Meiert

There Are Better Things to Code Than Forms â€” With the SurveyJS drag-and-drop form builder, you can generate and style dynamic, JSON-driven forms right in your JS app (Angular / React / Vue.js /Â jQuery).

SurveyJS sponsor

tailwindcss-highlights: A Tailwind Plugin to Add Highlights to Text â€” The term â€œhighlightsâ€ here refers to an effect similar to a highlighter pen for marking up an actual paper document. Includes 20 variants of the effect, which you can see here.

Julian

â–¶Â Â Inter 4.0: A Big Font Update for UI Design â€” Now with true italics, optical sizing changes, and stylistic alternatives. However, this version 4.0 update doesnâ€™t appear to be on Google FontsÂ yet.

Oliver SchÃ¶ndorfer

Slab: A Programmable Markup Language That Simplifies The Creation of HTML â€” An alternative to tools like Pug, claiming to offer advantages like improved readability, built-in programming constructs, integration with JSON data, and an easy learningÂ curve.

VÃµ Minh Thu

Brecht De Rutte

The Art of Dithering and Retro Shading for the Web â€” A lot of time spent building a striking effect for the Web has turned into an equally fantastic deep dive on the concepts around rendering graphical effects using shaders. This is advanced stuff, but itâ€™s great to know itâ€™sÂ possible.

The Artificial Intelligence Act is the first-ever legal framework on AI, attempting to address its risks along with positioning Europe as a leader in AIÂ legislation.
